welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Totowa, where small-town charm meets big-city convenience! Known for its scenic beauty and rich history, we invite you to explore our charming city and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free wifi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers VIP services for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to the needs of private jet owners and their guests.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network while waiting for their flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and is home to airlines such as American Airlines, Delta, and Southwest.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights and is home to airlines such as JetBlue, United, and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights and is home to airlines such as Alaska Airlines, Frontier, and Spirit.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport for up to 30 minutes.

terminals.name: Terminal 7

terminals.name: Terminal 8

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport caters to private jets and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network after agreeing to the terms and conditions.
